title: Shawl, 1952-105-71, First quarter of the 20th century
medium:
Medium: wool
Technique: interlocking twill, free shuttle detail
creditline: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. G. Glen Gould
description: Kashmir shawl with a horizontal repeat of flowers flanked by elaborate interlace of decorated arabesques; twining flower sprays fill interstices; scrolling floral guard band with guard strip above and below.  Purples, bright turquoise, yellow, orange, cerise, greens, browns, on white ground.
